revised_title: A Study of Decussating Tracts in the Mid- and Inter-Brain and the Pyramidal System in the Mesencephalon and Bulb
tldr: The authors investigate the decussating tracts in the mid- and inter-brain and the pyramidal system in the mesencephalon and bulb using the Marchi method. They describe the upper and lower decussations of Forel and their relationship to the arcuate system of fibres, providing insights into the neural connections and pathways in the brain.
